item.title: A new space for snake
item.description: Oh yeah. We’re rollin now. Bug fixes and new state trigger logic! Diagonal movement bug Had to change the movement vector code to fix a bug that would allow the player to move in diagonals… which kind of breaks the whole rule set of Snake now doesn’t it. This is because the Input.get_vector() func will create a vector based on all inputs it recieves. Good for some games like top down 2d or 3d games, not good for snake.
